eas_text: A CIVIL AUTHORITY HAS ISSUED A FIRE WARNING FOR THE FOLLOWING COUNTIES/AREAS: Chelan, WA; AT 09:20 PM ON SEP 25, 2025 EFFECTIVE UNTIL 11:20 PM. MESSAGE FROM WSLF/CAP.
extra_text:
Chelan County Sheriff WILDFIRE WARNING, Level 2 Evacuation Advisory in Upper Sunnyslope. The affected area is West Eagle Rock from Lupine Lane, April Drive from Rue Jolie, Adel Lane, Anna Lane, Crestview from Rue Jolie, and Knowles Road from Knowles Heights Lane. Roads and evacuation routes can become blocked. If you do not leave now, you could be trapped, injured, or killed. For updates check Local Radio, TV or the Chelan County Emergency Management Website and Facebook.
Repeat.
Chelan County Sheriff WILDFIRE WARNING, Level 2 Evacuation Advisory in Upper Sunnyslope. The affected area is West Eagle Rock from Lupine Lane, April Drive from Rue Jolie, Adel Lane, Anna Lane, Crestview from Rue Jolie, and Knowles Road from Knowles Heights Lane. Roads and evacuation routes can become blocked. If you do not leave now, you could be trapped, injured, or killed. For updates check Local Radio, TV or the Chelan County Emergency Management Website and Facebook. Please monitor local radio stations and Chelan County Emergency Management Facebook for updates.
